thread.title: Father John Misty, Lorde, Scarlett Johansson Set for “Saturday Night Live” - Pitchfork
thread.title_full: Father John Misty, Lorde, Scarlett Johansson Set for “Saturday Night Live” - Pitchfork

title: Father John Misty, Lorde, Scarlett Johansson Set for “Saturday Night Live” - Pitchfork

organizations.name: bryan bedder/getty images for moet & chandon

text:
Father John Misty, Lorde, Scarlett Johansson Set for “Saturday Night Live” Hidden Figures ’ Octavia Spencer is also scheduled to host Lorde (John Shearer/Getty Images), Father John Misty (Scott Dudelson/WireImage), Scarlett Johansson (Bryan Bedder/Getty Images for Moet & Chandon) 
“ Saturday Night Live ” has announced its next two musical guests: Father John Misty and Lorde . FJM will perform on the March 4 show, hosted by Octavia Spencer ( Hidden Figures , A Time to Kill ). Lorde is set for March 11, hosted by Scarlett Johansson . Check out the announcement below. 
Father John Misty will release his next record Pure Comedy on April 7 (via Sub Pop / Bella Union ). So far, he’s put out the title track , “ Two Wildly Different Perspectives ,” and “ Ballad of the Dying Man .” He also premiered a long song called “ Leaving LA ” during a BBC Radio 6 session. 
Lorde is currently at work on her heavily-anticipated follow-up to Pure Heroine . This past November, she gave a long update about the forthcoming LP . The new album “is about what comes next,” she wrote. 
So far in 2017, “SNL” has booked Sturgill Simpson , Big Sean , Ed Sheeran, and Alessia Cara as musical guests. Aziz Ansari, Kristen Stewart, Felicity Jones, and Alec Baldwin have hosted.
